location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from John MacLeod to Captain Frederick Faithfull, Commanding the Squadron in the Gulf of Persia

mods.abstract: The letter, sent from Bassidore [BasidÅ«], informs Faithfull of MacLeod's appointment as Resident in the Persian Gulf by the Governor in Council and that he has received charge of duties from Lieutenant-Colonel Bennett. He writes that he desires to proceed to Bushere [Bushire] immediately and requests passage on board any of the cruizers under the command of Faithfull.
